parameters.name: ColumnIndex
parameters.description: 0-based index of column to sort by (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SortAscending
parameters.description: True to sort ascending, false to sort descending

title: IWeldmentCutListAnnotation.Sort
description: Sorts this weldment cut list by the specified column in the specified sorting direction.
signature:
System.Boolean Sort( 
   System.Int32
ColumnIndex
,
   System.Boolean
SortAscending
)

parameters.name: ColumnIndex
parameters.description: 0-based index of column to sort by (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SortAscending
parameters.description: True to sort ascending, false to sort descending

returns: True if sorted successfully, false if not
remarks:
Weldment cut lists must be sorted by any column except Item Number.
See
Sorting Tables
for more information.
